page.title: 13LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: THERE IS AMPLE OPPORTUNITY FOR LEISURE ACTIVITIES IN THE AREA.THERE ARE DAY TIME AND EVENING INSTITUTES OFFERING EDUCATIONAL AND RECREATIONAL COURSES IN ALL SUBJECTS FOR ADULTS. THE AREA IS WELL SERVED WITH PARKS AND OPEN SPACE AND THERE ARE MANY SPORTS CLUBS WHICH CATER FOR THE ACTIVELY INCLINED.A SAMPLE SURVEY SHOWED THAT 55% OF WOMEN AND 69% OF MEN TAKE PART IN ACTIVITIES OUTSIDE THE HOME,ALTHOUGH MEN'S ACTIVITIES ARE MAINLY RESTRICTED TO THE WEEKENDS.ACTIVITIES SUCH AS GOLF,SWIMMING,ATHLETICS AND GYMNASTICS ARE ENJOYED BY BOTH SEXES.78% OF CHILDREN TAKE PART IN OUT OF SCHOOL ACTIVITIES,SUCH AS SCOUTS,GUIDES,SPORT ETC. LESS ACTIVE LEISURE PURSUITS INCLUDE GARDENING,READING,SEWING,KNITTING AND D.I.Y..THE MOST POPULAR ACTIVITY IN ALL HOMES FOR ALL AGES IS T.V. WATCHING.
